attributes.action: get rid of glass bottles completely and replace with plastic to help to stop street drinkers breaking glass bottles and animals/humans getting injured!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Animals are being hurt badly in alot areas along with children and older people perhaps falling on broken glass.. that children are breaking (for fun) when generally under-age drinking.Yes lets try and cut out underage drinking, but meanwhile would it be viable to change glass to plastic?Protect our animals/pets and our society of people living amongst this nightmare!Also..save on nhs bills for the government and vet bills for the public..whilst being able to recycle also!!
